word: God will be with you if you will be with Him. Take care that you do not leave a wrong impression upon minds in reference to yourself. . . . We need the cloudy pillar to lead us constantly. We have the assurance of the presence of God; you have it--"Lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world." [Matthew 28:20.] God bless you.--Letter 12, 1887, pp. 1-4, 6, 7, 11, 12. (To Brother Boyd: "Broader View of the Work Necessary," June 25, 1887.)
